attributes.action: Remove VAT and place a cap on the cost of Covid PCR tests.
attributes.additional_details: So people can safely travel abroad again and get back to some sort of normality
attributes.background: To demonstrate support for the travel industry and stop excessive pricing

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585095

The Government is not responsible for the price of commercially available products, but we could accept a petition calling on the Government to make PCR tests freely available to all, or available at a certain price, if that's something you would like to happen.
